pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and Use of the Quantile-Based Skew Logistic Distribution // The skew logistic distribution is a quantile- defined generalisation of the logistic distribution (van Staden and King 2015). Provides random numbers, quantiles, probabilities, densities and density quantiles for the distribution. It provides Quantile-Quantile plots and method of L-Moments estimation (including asymptotic standard errors) for the distribution.
